Actions.Name: Get enterprise by ID
Actions.Description: This method allows you to retrieve the details of your enterprise.

Actions.Name: Get list of all projects
Actions.Description: This method retrieves all the reforestation projects available.

Actions.Name: Get project by ID
Actions.Description: This method allows you to retrieve the details of a single reforestation project.

Actions.Name: Count trees for a user
Actions.Description: This method allows you to retrieve the number of trees planted by a specific user.

Actions.Name: Count trees for an enterprise for any range of date
Actions.Description: This method allows you to retrieve the number of trees planted by an enterprise for any range of date.

Actions.Name: Count trees for an enterprise by month
Actions.Description: This method allows you to retrieve the number of trees planted by an enterprise for a specific month.

Actions.Name: Get details of a single request to plant one or many trees
Actions.Description: This method allows you to retrieve the details of a single request to plant trees.

Actions.Name: Plant one or many trees
Actions.Description: This method sends the request to plant one or many trees.
